name: Burger Fall - Feed Hungry Jimmy
description:
Jimmy and his lovely dog, Charlie, are best friends with the same hobby-eating. Recently, they’ve signed up for the eating competition together. No pain no gain! In order to win the honorary title of Super Eaters, they must practice hard.

Now they start the training mode every day. Remember, Jimmy is a burger addict, and Charlie is a bone addict. Don’t mix up, or Jimmy would be beaten up by his mummy, and the pet would get fat horribly.

Rules are simple: Tap the screen to change the position of Jimmy and Charlie; Make sure that Jimmy eats burgers and Charlie eats bones.

Start the game and tuck in!


Features:
- Attractive theme: lovely kimono & cute cat
- Interesting user interface
-Lively background music
-Easy & Addictive
